DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether novel upper extremity rehabilitation system for patients with stroke(e-glove system) are effective in the rehabilitation compared to conventional occupational therapy
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Novel Game Rehabilitation System on Upper Extremity Function of Patients With Stroke
DOC.criteria: Hemiplegic stroke patients Medical research council scale >= 2 of finger or wrist flexor/extensor Medical research council scale >= 2 of elbow pronation/supination Bilateral weakness of upper extremities Uncontrolled medical or surgical illness Predisposing psychological or neurological disorders Severe aphasia unable to communicate Severe cognitive impairment not to cooperate Severe pain impeding upper extremity rehabilitation
